scripts.test:worker: npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- serverless invoke local --function worker --path src/test-events/sqs-event.json
scripts.test:notification-processor: npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- serverless invoke local --function notificationProcessor --path src/test-events/notification-event.json
scripts.test:delivery-processor: npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- serverless invoke local --function deliveryProcessor --path src/test-events/delivery-event.json
scripts.test:job-progress-checker: npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- serverless invoke local --function jobProgressChecker --path src/test-events/job-progress-event.json
scripts.test:external-image-import: npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- serverless invoke local --function imageUploadProcessor --path src/test-events/external-image-import-event.json
scripts.test:zip-archive-processor: npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- serverless invoke local --function zipArchiveProcessor --path src/test-events/zip-creation-event.json
scripts.test:s3-image-import-processor: npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- serverless invoke local --function imageUploadFromS3Processor --path src/test-events/s3-image-import-event.json
scripts.test:s3-delivery-processor: npx dotenv -e .env.dev -- serverless invoke local --function s3DeliveryProcessor --path src/test-events/s3-delivery-event.json
